author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Indo-Italian Chamber of Commerce and Industry will start its next Italian and German language classes at the end of this month. The classes will be held at 2B, Jamals, No. 17, Jagannathan Road, Nungambakkam, on Saturday, January 30.

Those interested may contact Angela Dall’Agnol at 09543010435, email at a.agnol@indiaitaly.com or log on towww.languagelabchennai.com, a release said.
title: Language classes from Jan. 30
